languages.text: "Как ты жесток{mf||а} к своим сородичам! Мон-кай немало потрудились, развлекая свою высокую публику. Каждый из них сражается с отчаянной силой, стремясь заслужить свое место в коробке с моими игрушками. Места в ней предостаточно — от моих забав игрушки так легко ломаются".

"How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."
languages.original_text: "Как ты жесток{mf||а} к своим сородичам! Мон-кай немало потрудились, развлекая свою высокую публику. Каждый из них сражается с отчаянной силой, стремясь заслужить свое место в коробке с моими игрушками. Места в ней предостаточно — от моих забав игрушки так легко ломаются".

traits.locale_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! Mon-keigh worked hard to entertain their highborn spectators. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my toybox. There is always room for more — I break my toys more often than not."
traits.speaker: Tazarra

Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."
traits.speaker: Tazarra

languages.text: 「不幸な同胞になんて仕打ちだ！このモン＝ケイ達は、お得意様を楽しませようと懸命に働いてくれた。どいつも私のおもちゃ箱で居場所を確保しようと、絶望から湧いた力で戦っている。おもちゃ箱はいつでも仲間を募集しているぞ…私のおもちゃはとても壊れやすくてね」
languages.original_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."

traits.locale_text: 「不幸な同胞になんて仕打ちだ！このモン＝ケイ達は、お得意様を楽しませようと懸命に働いてくれた。どいつも私のおもちゃ箱で居場所を確保しようと、絶望から湧いた力で戦っている。おもちゃ箱はいつでも仲間を募集しているぞ…私のおもちゃはとても壊れやすくてね」
traits.speaker: Tazarra

languages.text: “你对你这些不幸的族人实在是太残忍了！这些猴子这么努力，拼命想要取悦那些上层观众。每个人都带着搏命的态度战斗，想要在我的玩具盒里赢得一席之地。不过，我这里还有更多空间，因为我的玩具真的很容易玩坏。”
languages.original_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."

traits.locale_text: “你对你这些不幸的族人实在是太残忍了！这些猴子这么努力，拼命想要取悦那些上层观众。每个人都带着搏命的态度战斗，想要在我的玩具盒里赢得一席之地。不过，我这里还有更多空间，因为我的玩具真的很容易玩坏。”
traits.speaker: Tazarra

languages.text: « Comme vous êtes {mf|cruel|cruelle} avec vos semblables ! Ces pauvres mon-keigh ont fait de leur mieux pour divertir un public d'élite. Chacun d'entre eux se bat avec la force du désespoir, dans le seul et unique but de se faire une place dans ma boîte à jouets. Et il y a toujours de la place dans ma boîte. Après tout, mes jouets se brisent si facilement. »
languages.original_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."

traits.locale_text: « Comme vous êtes {mf|cruel|cruelle} avec vos semblables ! Ces pauvres mon-keigh ont fait de leur mieux pour divertir un public d'élite. Chacun d'entre eux se bat avec la force du désespoir, dans le seul et unique but de se faire une place dans ma boîte à jouets. Et il y a toujours de la place dans ma boîte. Après tout, mes jouets se brisent si facilement. »
traits.speaker: Tazarra

languages.text: «¡Qué cruel eres hacia tus pobres parientes! Estos mon-keigh han trabajado duramente para entretener a su exquisito público. Cada uno de ellos lucha desesperadamente para ganarse un puesto entre mis juguetes. Y siempre hay sitio para más, se rompen muy fácilmente».
languages.original_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."

traits.locale_text: «¡Qué cruel eres hacia tus pobres parientes! Estos mon-keigh han trabajado duramente para entretener a su exquisito público. Cada uno de ellos lucha desesperadamente para ganarse un puesto entre mis juguetes. Y siempre hay sitio para más, se rompen muy fácilmente».
traits.speaker: Tazarra

languages.text: "Wie grausam Ihr zu Euren bedauernswerten Verwandten seid! Diese Chem-Pan-Sey haben sich wirklich ins Zeug gelegt, um ihr verwöhntes Publikum zu unterhalten. Jeder von ihnen kämpft mit einer Stärke, die aus Verzweiflung erwachsen ist. Jeder will sich seinen Platz in meiner Spielzeugkiste verdienen. Und es ist immer reichlich Platz — meine Spielzeuge gehen so schnell kaputt."
languages.original_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."

traits.locale_text: "Wie grausam Ihr zu Euren bedauernswerten Verwandten seid! Diese Chem-Pan-Sey haben sich wirklich ins Zeug gelegt, um ihr verwöhntes Publikum zu unterhalten. Jeder von ihnen kämpft mit einer Stärke, die aus Verzweiflung erwachsen ist. Jeder will sich seinen Platz in meiner Spielzeugkiste verdienen. Und es ist immer reichlich Platz — meine Spielzeuge gehen so schnell kaputt."
traits.speaker: Tazarra

languages.text: "Zavallı hısımlarına karşı ne kadar acımasızsın! Mon-keighler, seçkin seyircilerini eğlendirmek için çok uğraştı. Her biri, bu oyuncak kutusu misali arenada bir yer edinmek için biçare bir güçle savaştı. Her zaman yeni oyuncaklara yerim vardır. Ne de olsa kolay kırılıyorlar."
languages.original_text: "How cruel you are to your unfortunate kin! These mon-keigh have worked hard to entertain their elite audience. Each of them fights with a strength born of desperation, seeking to earn their place in my box of toys. There is always room for more — my toys do break so very easily."

traits.locale_text: "Zavallı hısımlarına karşı ne kadar acımasızsın! Mon-keighler, seçkin seyircilerini eğlendirmek için çok uğraştı. Her biri, bu oyuncak kutusu misali arenada bir yer edinmek için biçare bir güçle savaştı. Her zaman yeni oyuncaklara yerim vardır. Ne de olsa kolay kırılıyorlar."
traits.speaker: Tazarra
